title: Nostalgia Modern Retro Countertop Microwave Oven - 900-Watt - 0.9 cu ft - 12 Pre-Programmed Cooking Settings - Digital Clock - Kitchen Appliances - Black
description: With a beautiful and sleek retro design, this small microwave is sure to stand out in any kitchen. It features 6-pre programmed cooking settings and a bright LED display, making usability simple. Ten power levels and 700 watts of power are perfect for reheating leftovers or cooking food. Utilize express cooking, defrost, child-lock, or multi-stage cooking for all your microwave needs. Also featured is a rotating glass carousel, child lock function, multi-stage cooking, and two defrost modes by weight and time.
